The tiny shuttlecraft shudders as it skips off the planet's 
atmosphere, then plunges in like a meteor.  In the cockpit, the 
ship's lone occupant fights for control as his mind runs over the 
events of the past few megacycles ...

It had been a perfectly routine joyride-like flight, until he'd been 
attacked by space pirates and forced into an asteroid belt.  Some 
sort of space wormhole had been hit by the weapons fire from the 
pirate ship and both craft had been sucked in.  In the ensuing chaos 
of the sudden exit from that same tunnel, pursuer and persuee were 
seperated ...

Yet another alarm starts blaring, and the shuttle pilot deactivates 
it automatically, almost before he sees what it means.  "Perfect," he 
growls.  "At this rate I'm gonna burn up before I even hit the 
ground!"

To be continued ...
